title: Ezrael name glitch
body: In game, where the champion name should appear in the chat box is blank for ezrael. eg Raize(ezrael) appears as Raize(). I have seen this in 3 games and im wondering if its just me (other members of the game tell me its happened for them too) or if its just a glitch

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
